Description:
* User defined name of the group.
* Range for ``N`` is 0-99.

 **Example**: ``grp0``, ``grp1``, and ``grp2``.

* Scalable unit and rack number range.
* Range for ``<n>`` is 0-99.
* **Format**: ``SU-<n>.RACK-<n>``

 **Example**: ``SU-1.RACK-1``

.. note:: This attribute is case-sensitive. Ensure to use uppercase characters only.

* This attribute lists the service tags of the active Kubernetes and slurm head node(s).
* Provide this attribute value only for group of nodes belonging to ``kube_node`` and ``slurm_node`` roles. For all other roles, this attribute should be left empty.

* This attribute lists the service tags of the active ``service`` nodes.
* Provide this attribute value only for group of nodes belonging to ``service`` roles. For all other roles, this attribute should be left empty.

.. note:: If ``service`` role is not defined, then value will be empty for worker and default role.

* This attribute contains the BMC (iDRAC) static IP range.
* Provide this attribute value only if BMC discovery mechanism is used while provisioning the nodes.

 **Example**: ``10.5.0.1-10.5.0.200``
This attribute contains the IP address of the switch connected to the rack.
This attribute contains the port details of the switch connected to the rack.

* Architecture of the nodes.
* Possible values: ``x86`` or ``ARM``
